tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE financial_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50),
    metric_value DECIMAL(10,2),
    date_recorded DATE
)

CREATE TABLE trend_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  analysis_name VARCHAR(255),
  analysis_description TEXT,
  analyst_name VARCHAR(100),
  analysis_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE financial_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  ticker_symbol VARCHAR(10),
  volume INT,
  price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE balance_sheet (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  ticker_symbol VARCHAR(10),
  assets DECIMAL,
  liabilities DECIMAL,
  equity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE income_statement (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  ticker_symbol VARCHAR(10),
  revenue DECIMAL,
  expenses DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE financial_ratios (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  ticker_symbol VARCHAR(10),
  liquidity_ratio DECIMAL,
  profitability_ratio DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE financial_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  revenue DECIMAL,
  expenses DECIMAL,
  profit DECIMAL,
  date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  stock_price DECIMAL,
  date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE market_trends (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE industry_metrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  industry_name VARCHAR(255),
  revenue DECIMAL,
  expenses DECIMAL,
  profit DECIMAL,
  date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE financial_ratios (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  ratio_name VARCHAR(255),
  ratio DECIMAL,
  date DATE
)
